description: has rip-offs of real games. not even educational

Although this suite of games is quite entertaining to my 6 year old, it lacks many features.
Firtst off, as a parent I would want to have the ability to make the game go full screen but instead this is stuck in wondowed mode, so my daughter can still access my desktop and the menu. Needless to say that this led to interesting situations.
Further, ther game lacks levels of difficutly. There are 6 levels (a star of each level) but my daughter breezed though all of them in a few hours and now needs something more challenging. For example, the puzzle does not get complex enough to meet her skill level, and she is only 6. 
Still three stars because my daughter was entertained, although it fails to meet her needs as she progresses through the game. Definitely needs work and more features.
its not even educational. its so worst
